search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for EventTemple (eventtemple.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for EventTemple can be found at: [https://www.eventtemple.com/pricing/](https://www.eventtemple.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

“I don’t know what I would do without EventTemple! It saves me tons and tons of time.”

![Image 47: Customer Avatar](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d027d946925bd98cfcfa11/65038b0f0618d3491827ee86_avatar-02.webp)

Sandy Lunger McDavid

Palafox Wharf Waterfront

Frequently Asked Questions

Do you offer free trials?

Yes, you can try it before you buy.

Is there a minimum contract term?

Yes, we have a minimum 1 year term.

Is it monthly or annual billing?

All prices are based on annual payment.

How can I pay?

Credit Card, ACH or Wire Transfer.

Is there a multi-property discount?

We offer chain and group pricing.

Do you charge any additional fees?

Yes, depending on your setup requirements.

Can you import my data?

Yes we can! Import fees may vary.

How long does it take to “go live”?

1 day to 4 weeks is a typical range.

Ready for the next step?

See why we've been voted #1, ten times in a row!

Our pricing model was developed to reflect our core values. Choose out of three different packages based on your businesses size and needs.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing starts at $249 per month and is based on annual payment. Custom quotes are available based on business needs.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Pricing tailored to your business needs.

additional_fees.fee_description: Additional fees may apply depending on setup requirements.
Fees for importing data may vary.

Frequently Asked Questions

Do you offer free trials?

Yes, you can try it before you buy.

Is there a minimum contract term?

Yes, we have a minimum 1 year term.

Is it monthly or annual billing?

All prices are based on annual payment.

How can I pay?

Credit Card, ACH or Wire Transfer.

Is there a multi-property discount?

We offer chain and group pricing.

Do you charge any additional fees?

Yes, depending on your setup requirements.

Can you import my data?

Yes we can! Import fees may vary.

How long does it take to “go live”?

1 day to 4 weeks is a typical range.

Ready for the next step?
